anathema: Spoil the fun, use a prank to cause real harm
edict: Relish in jokes and pranks, lighten the mood, embrace surprises

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Picoperi (Merrygleam)](/Deities.aspx?ID=651)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 12

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Relish in jokes and pranks, lighten the mood, embrace surprises

**Anathema** Spoil the fun, use a prank to cause real harm

**Area of Concern**
Jokes, pranks, and surprises

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34)

**Favored Weapon** [Blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=424)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Disorientation](/Domains.aspx?ID=105), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=1547)

- **3rd**
[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=1525)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=1605)

</column>
